Question: How to approve an appointment
Answer: Please choose Appointments option on the side bar.

Question: How to create patient records
Answer: Please choose Create Patient Info option on the side bar.

Question: How to view the patient records
Answer: Please choose View Patient Records option on the side bar.

Question: How to view diagnosis of the patients
Answer: Please choose View Patient Records option on the side bar.

Question: How to view prescriptions
Answer: Please choose View Patient Records option on the side bar.

Question: Where to view lab/test reports
Answer: Please choose View Patient Records option on the side bar.

Question: How to create transaction request
Answer: Please choose Transactions option on the side bar.

Question: How to complete the transaction request
Answer: Please choose Transactions option on the side bar.
